title: Registration
description: Pick up your badge and convention materials

title: Vendor Hall
description: Shop for all your favorite pony merchandise!

title: Opening
description: Join us in Mane Events for our HarmonyCon 2025 kickoff!!! (Also, rawr >:3)

title: What's Your Favorite Pony's Favorite Musical
description: The first half will be a discussion on what musical would be the favorite musical of our favorite ponies, the second half will be what the audience's favorite musicals say about them. Fair warning, you might get roasted if you like a bad musical!

title: Bright Eyes in the Thunderclouds: The Official Premiere
description: The official premiere of the animated remake of Project Thundercloud, a fully animated 15 minutes long short film about Derpy Hooves having to save Equestria from a mysterious storm.

title: Animation Horror Picture Show - Tales of Animation Gone Wrong
description: Animation is a monument to mankind's hubris. CaptainHoers regales over a decade of trials and tribulations of wrangling pixels into motion against their will.

title: Fanfiction Writing Workshop
description: Learn the fundamentals of writing fanfiction and workshop your ideas with fellow writers

title: Cutting Half the Track List
description: A panel where you create music through the art of mashups! First, we'll discuss what makes a mashup work, and then we'll take requests from the audience on what songs they want to see mashed up!

title: Trivia Trot 2: The Second One
description: Think you know all there is to know about MLP and related media! Come test that knowledge and compete in Trivia Trot 2! Not just your average trivia panel. Here there are even questions about questions! The Second one brings more fun.

title: Before You Play 'The Pony Puzzle': Essence 20 Overview
description: Learn the basics of the Essence 20 system before diving into The Pony Puzzle adventure!

title: Perler Bead Workshop
description: Learn how to create cute pony designs with Perler beads!

title: Singing in Character with Shannon, Kazumi, & Rena
description: Join our special guests for a musical demonstration of character voices!

title: Creator Roundup: Harmony Con Edition!
description: Meet your favorite content creators and learn about their latest projects!

title: Let's Make Harmony!
description: A collaborative creativity workshop where we make something wonderful together!

title: RiffPonies!
description: Join us as we lovingly riff on some classic pony content!

title: How Comics Come to Life with Tony & Jeremy
description: Get an inside look at the comic creation process from the pros!

title: Autographs for VAs
description: Meet and get autographs from our special voice actor guests!

title: Jeopardy!: My Little Pony Edition
description: Test your pony knowledge in this game show format!

title: Soundcheck
description: Technical preparation for the evening's concert

title: Iyashikei and MLP: Slice of Life and Healing
description: Exploring the healing aspects of MLP through the lens of Japanese anime concepts

title: Meet the Community Guests
description: Meet and chat with our wonderful community guests!

title: Pony Town's Something Social
description: Learn about and discuss this unique social platform!

title: Getting Creative with Pony Cosplay!
description: Tips and tricks for creating your own pony costumes!

title: How to make Furrends @ cons
description: Tips and strategies for meeting new friends at conventions!

title: Ponify That Movie!
description: Reimagining famous movies in the world of Equestria!

title: The Best Thing About MLP Bracket
description: Help us determine the best thing about MLP in this interactive bracket!

title: Concert
description: An evening of amazing pony music!

title: Don't Be a Loppy!
description: Learn about convention etiquette and how to be a good con-goer!

title: Color-A-Critter Club
description: Join us for a relaxing coloring session!

title: Fallout Equestria: The Animated Series
description: Updates and discussion about the Fallout Equestria animation project

title: Cultural Impact of Bad FanFic - The My Immortal Panel
description: A deep dive into infamous fanfiction and its impact on fandom culture

title: Glimmer Gang Appreciation Meetup
description: A meetup for fans of Starlight Glimmer!

title: Flying in Formation: The similarities in the Pegasi of Equestria and Human Aviation
description: Exploring the parallels between pegasus flight and real-world aviation

title: The Stage Coach
description: Learn about stage presence and performance techniques!

title: Name That Frame! A Pony Trivia Game
description: Test your visual memory of pony episodes in this fast-paced game!

title: The Blind Brainstorm - Creating OC's Edition!
description: Last year we had you all create barmy stories in teams that didn't know what each other was thinking. This year it's the turn of characters! Come and learn how to concept and design OCs FOR a story, with Fuzzy of Murky Number Seven giving writing advice, as well as hosting the titular Blind Brainstorm where teams will design an OC... without knowing what each other are planning to add!

title: Whooves Line Is It Anyway?
description: Pony-themed improv comedy where everything's made up and the points don't matter!

title: 2 Ponies, 1 Lie
description: A fun deduction game where players try to spot the lie among pony facts!

title: Small-Time Horse Youtubers
description: Meet and support smaller YouTubers in the MLP community!

title: Cards Against Equestria for Charity
description: Play a pony-themed card game while raising money for charity!

title: Convention Stories
description: Share your favorite convention memories and stories!

title: Magic of Friendship Open Mic
description: Share your talents with fellow fans in this open mic session!

title: Pony Tales Lost as a Curse Word: A Brony's Guide to MLP Grimdark
description: Exploring the darker side of pony fan content
